languages.text: По укромной долине разбросаны сотни, если не тысячи, скелетов животных. Изучение авгурами позволило предположить, что в этом месте происходит выброс сонного газа. Вероятно, животные попадают в ловушку, не подозревая о невидимом убийце. Или же приходят умирать сюда намеренно.

The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realise that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.
languages.original_text: По укромной долине разбросаны сотни, если не тысячи, скелетов животных. Изучение авгурами позволило предположить, что в этом месте происходит выброс сонного газа. Вероятно, животные попадают в ловушку, не подозревая о невидимом убийце. Или же приходят умирать сюда намеренно.

traits.locale_text: A hidden valley is littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Data received from the augurs leads one to believe that some kind of sleeping gas is released here. The animals either don't realise they're going into a deadly trap, or come here to die on purpose.

A hidden valley is littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Data received from the augurs leads one to believe that some kind of sleeping gas is released here. The animals either don't realise they're going into a deadly trap, or come here to die on purpose.

The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. The data received from the augurs leads one to believe that some kind of sleeping gas was released here. It's likely the animals either don't realize that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realise that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realize that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realise that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

languages.text: 船员们发现了一个隐蔽的山谷，里面堆积着成千上万的动物骨架。扫描结果表明，某种催眠性的气体散溢在这片山谷中。这些动物很有可能根本没有意识到自己正在一步步走向死亡陷阱，甚至可能是故意来这里寻死。
languages.original_text: The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realise that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

traits.locale_text: 船员们发现了一个隐蔽的山谷，里面堆积着成千上万的动物骨架。扫描结果表明，某种催眠性的气体散溢在这片山谷中。这些动物很有可能根本没有意识到自己正在一步步走向死亡陷阱，甚至可能是故意来这里寻死。

languages.text: La tripulación ha descubierto un valle oculto con miles de esqueletos de animales. Los datos de los augures sugieren que se filtra algún tipo de gas somnífero por la zona. Es probable que los animales no sepan que les acecha una trampa mortal... o incluso que vengan aquí a morir a propósito.
languages.original_text: The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realise that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación ha descubierto un valle oculto con miles de esqueletos de animales. Los datos de los augures sugieren que se filtra algún tipo de gas somnífero por la zona. Es probable que los animales no sepan que les acecha una trampa mortal... o incluso que vengan aquí a morir a propósito.

languages.text: クルーは、何千もの動物の骸骨が散乱している隠れた谷を発見した。スキャナーのデータによると、ここにはある種の睡眠ガスが噴出しているようだ。動物たちは自分たちが致命的な罠にかかっていたことに気づいていないか、あるいは意図的にここに来て死んでいる可能性がある。
languages.original_text: The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realise that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

traits.locale_text: クルーは、何千もの動物の骸骨が散乱している隠れた谷を発見した。スキャナーのデータによると、ここにはある種の睡眠ガスが噴出しているようだ。動物たちは自分たちが致命的な罠にかかっていたことに気づいていないか、あるいは意図的にここに来て死んでいる可能性がある。

languages.text: Die Crew hat verborgenes Tal entdeckt, das mit den Skeletten von Tausenden von Tieren übersät ist. Augurendaten weisen darauf hin, dass hier eine Art Schlafgas in der Luft liegt. Den Tieren war wohl entweder nicht klar, dass sie sich in eine tödliche Falle begeben, oder sie sind absichtlich hergekommen, um hier zu sterben.
languages.original_text: The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realise that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

traits.locale_text: Die Crew hat verborgenes Tal entdeckt, das mit den Skeletten von Tausenden von Tieren übersät ist. Augurendaten weisen darauf hin, dass hier eine Art Schlafgas in der Luft liegt. Den Tieren war wohl entweder nicht klar, dass sie sich in eine tödliche Falle begeben, oder sie sind absichtlich hergekommen, um hier zu sterben.

languages.text: L'équipage a découvert une vallée cachée remplie de milliers de squelettes d'animaux. Les données des augures suggèrent qu'une sorte de gaz soporifique est présent dans l'air. Soit les animaux ne se sont pas rendu compte qu'ils se rendaient dans un piège mortel, soit ils sont venus y mourir volontairement.
languages.original_text: The crew has discovered a hidden valley littered with thousands of animal skeletons. Augur data suggests that some kind of sleeping gas vents here. It's likely the animals either don't realise that they are headed for a deadly trap, or even come here to die on purpose.

traits.locale_text: L'équipage a découvert une vallée cachée remplie de milliers de squelettes d'animaux. Les données des augures suggèrent qu'une sorte de gaz soporifique est présent dans l'air. Soit les animaux ne se sont pas rendu compte qu'ils se rendaient dans un piège mortel, soit ils sont venus y mourir volontairement.
